LanguageData.Apparello_Bandit.label: Bandit scarf
LanguageData.Apparello_Bandit.description: Stylish, elegant and soft to the touch. Known as the most important part of western attire, sspecially amongst the card cheats and other slippery individuals. It comes with a scarf for added banditry.
LanguageData.Apparello_Pilot.label: Aviator sunglasses
LanguageData.Apparello_Pilot.description: Authentic Rim-Ban™ quality. Cover your eyes with awesome!
LanguageData.Apparello_Shadess.label: Sunshades
LanguageData.Apparello_Shadess.description: A pair of stylish eye shades favoured for protection from the sun. The wearer will never get caught with the excuse "the sun was shining in my eyes!"
LanguageData.Apparello_Brimsk.label: Goggled Ski Mask
LanguageData.Apparello_Brimsk.description: A military grade mask with skiing goggles attached, with a slightly stylized design. It is known for its heavy impact resistance.
LanguageData.Marine_BattleMask.label: Marine Storm Mask
LanguageData.Marine_BattleMask.description: A mask with a of pair of marine special forces military grade goggles, slightly stylized design. It is known for having heavy impact resistance.
LanguageData.Apparel_Earmuff.label: earmuff
LanguageData.Apparel_Earmuff.description: A pair of soft pads connected by a band across the top of the head, that are worn over the ears to protect them from cold.
LanguageData.Apparello_Visoor.label: Shuttle Pilot's Visor
LanguageData.Apparello_Visoor.description: A pair of shuttle pilot's visors. It can be used to fulfill your usual piloting needs like calling in "Houston; mayday mayday - landing struts are jammed, I repeat landing struts are jammed. Copy? Roger Wilco. Starfox One out."
LanguageData.Marine_TacticalMask.label: Marine Tactical Mask
LanguageData.Marine_TacticalMask.description: A marine special forces black tactical mask. Also known as balaclava.
